attributes.action:
50% rights to fathers on the birth cirtificate 
regardless if your separated
attributes.additional_details: to show that you understand fathers need rights too
attributes.background: i would like the law on this to be changed due to the fact that there is good fathers out there too

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/322697
